revised_title: Jamaican Wildlife and Their Effects on Humans
tldr: The author describes various creatures found in Jamaica, such as lizards and insects, and their effects on humans. He also discusses the Manchinel-Apple, a deadly fruit, and its impact on the skin. The text includes observations on how these creatures and plants interact with humans and how they can be treated.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology and Entomology
